author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 15th anniversary of unveiling the 133-foot-tall Tiruvalluvar statue in Kanyakumari was observed on Friday. The statue was unveiled by the former Chief Minister, M. Karunanidhi on January 1, 2000. Leaders of various Tamil movements and political parties paid floral tributes to the statue. Kumari Historical and Cultural Research Centre President T. Velappan and its general secretary S. Padmanabhan, Sahitya Academi Awardee Poneelan paid tributes to the poet.

On behalf of DMK, former MP Helen Davidson, former MLAs K. Lawrence, R. Bernard and Agasteeswaram Block Secretary N. Thamarai Bharathi paid tributes to Tiruvalluvar.
title: Anniversary of Tiruvalluvar statue
